00022 #ifndef TIMER_HPP
00023 #define TIMER_HPP
00024 
00025 #include "object.hpp"
00026 #include "timedesc.hpp"
00027 
00028 /*
00029  * Here, we choose the right implementation using
00030  * conditional compilation.
00031  */
00032 
00033 #if defined(_WIN32) || defined(WIN32)
00034 #include "win32_timer.hpp"
00035 #else
00036 #include "linux_timer.hpp"
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 /*
00040  * This class is a proxy for specific implementation.
00041  */
00042 
00043 namespace uStreamLib {
00047         class US_API_EXPORT Timer : public Object {
00048         public:
00052                 Timer(void);
00053 
00057                 virtual ~Timer(void);
00058 
00062                 void reset(void)
00063                 {
00064                         _impl->reset();
00065                 }
00066 
00070                 void start(void)
00071                 {
00072                         _impl->start();
00073                 }
00074 
00081                 void stop(TimeDesc* td)
00082                 {
00083                         _impl->stop(td);
00084                 }
00085 
00092                 uint32 getElapsed(void)
00093                 {
00094                         return _impl->getElapsed();
00095                 }
00096                 
00097         private:
00098                 /* pointer to specific implementation */
00099                 Impl_Timer* _impl;
00100         };
00101 }

00103 #endif
